name: Entropia Treasure Hunt
description:
A game for explorers of planets Calypso, ROCKtropia, Arkadia, Cyrene and Next Island. Join the free treasure hunt. Somewhere on an Entropia Universe planet there are some items that have been dropped by a planet resident. Search the planets and find the items. Then return the items to the player and get a reward. Prizes will be handed out to players in-game, so you must be an Entropia Universe player to collect your prize.

You will be given clues to the locations to search for the items. These clues could be visual or written, or a combination. Prizes will be made up of a mixture of PED and items, such as weapons, armor, clothing, loot. When an item has been found, and the prize claimed, then new treasure hunts will be prepared for uploading to your device.
